column6:
Large 2 Bdrm unit at a resort condo development in beautiful Hunt, TX.

Free WiFi, parking and no fees for cleaning.

RESORT ONLY ALLOWS US TO BOOK DATES FOR OUR GUESTS FOR CHECK-IN DATES DURING THE NEXT 60 DAYS.

Since you will be a guest of mine, the resort requires guests to provide a refundable $100 security deposit that can be held with a credit card.
